description: about page of the app
account page when the user is signed in
account page when the user is a guest
the address page where the user can choose to add a new address
the page to edit the different info of the address
shopping cart page where the user can see all items in the cart
the dialog screen where the user can select the quantity of the item such as in the shopping cart
the dialog screen to confirm removing something such as an item from the cart
the page that shows all categories
the spinner to choose a city
the page that contains the contact info of the app company
the page that shows all filter options
the page to choose sort by
screen to start before the homepage such as showing get started
the help page of the app
home screen (usually has tabs etc)
the detail page of an item
the page to show all items (usually a list/gallery view after search)
menu screen (usually a side bar)
edit page of the user's profile
search screen
app settings page usually a listview
sign in screen with inputs fields of email/pwd etc
the screen to choose whether to sign in or sign up or what method to use such as email/FB/Amazon/Google
the page to enter the password such as when signing in and signing up (when the sign in or sign up process is separated in different screens)
the page to enter the input for username/firstname/lastname/email/phone when signing in (when the sign in process is separated in different screens)
sign up page with input fields
the page to enter birthday during the sign up process
the page where you can click skip
spinner to choose a state
the page to show legal information such as terms of the app or permission related info
the page to show all bookmarked/saved items
the page to adjust textsize
checkout screen and payment related
passowrd assistant page
the page to sign in with Amazon account
the screen for signing into google
the screen for signing into facebook
the popup screen to sign in with a Google account
any popup page/screen where something goes wrong such as an 'incorrect password' notice
app popup screen such as a 'new features' popup or 'enable notifications' popup or 'permission request' popup
screen to choose genger/sex
screen for the user's interests such as the My Topics page in news apps
notification screen
